word_mean: 饮食的：与饮食或食物有关的

sentence.Network_en: All dietetic meals are low in sugar.

sentence.Network_en: The American Dietetic Association commends two servings a week.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国营养膳食协会建议一周吃两份.

sentence.Network_en: Results Reasonable dietetic adjustment can release chemotherapy patients from the digestive system symptoms.
sentence.Network_cn: 结果通过合理的饮食调配,降低了患者化疗时的痛苦.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (as a noun in the sense 'diatetics'): via Latin from Greek diaitētikos, from diaita 'a way of life'

entry.tran: (食物或饮料)有助于减肥的，低热量的，低卡路里的
entry.def: Dietetic food or drink is food or drink that has been specially produced so that it does not contain many calories.

example.ex: All dietetic meals are low in sugar.
example.tran: 所有减肥餐的含糖量都很低。

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to the diet;
